title: Bug 4121 - JarExporter causes out of sync error
description: Bug 4121 - When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory, an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jarfile for the second time. Maybe the exported jar file should not include itself.
OB: When attempting to overwrite the exported jar file for the second time, an out of sync message is displayed.
EB: The exported jar file should not include itself to avoid the out of sync error.
SR:
1. Create a directory (project).
2. Export the directory as a jar file.
3. Place the exported jar file in the same directory.
4. Try to overwrite the exported jar file.
5. Observe the out of sync message.
